title: Matte Clay
description: Ce style présente une esthétique de rendu 3D minimaliste caractérisée par des textures lisses et mates qui ressemblent à du plastique souple ou à de la pâte à modeler. Il utilise un éclairage global doux et diffus ainsi que des palettes de couleurs pastel pour créer une apparence propre et ludique, typique des icônes d'interface utilisateur haut de gamme et du motion design moderne.
prompt: A pristine, high-end 3D rendering of {{subject}} designed in a minimalist 'Matte Clay' or claymorphism aesthetic. The subject is stylized with simplified geometry, featuring rounded edges, soft bevels, and a charming, toy-like proportion. The material texture is paramount: it must appear incredibly smooth, non-reflective, and velvety, resembling high-quality soft-touch silicone, matte plastic, or refined modeling clay. The color palette focuses on a dominant, soothing shade of {{primary_color}}, complemented by subtle details in {{accent_color}} to create visual interest without overwhelming the simplicity. The lighting is engineered for softness: utilize a high-key studio setup with broad softboxes and global illumination (GI) to banish all harsh shadows. Shadows should be limited to gentle ambient occlusion and soft contact shadows that ground the object. There is no gloss, specular highlights, or metallic reflection; the finish is purely satin and matte. The image should evoke a sense of playfulness and modern design elegance. background_prompt: A clean, seamless studio backdrop rendered in a soft, matte 3D style. The background consists of a solid pastel surface derived from {{primary_color}} or a neutral cream tone, featuring a smooth, curved infinite cyclorama. Floating in the periphery are abstract, geometric primitives like spheres, rounded cubes, or pills in {{accent_color}} with a soft clay texture, positioned to create a decorative frame or depth of field effect without cluttering the center. The lighting is uniform and diffuse, creating a calm, empty space ready for a subject.
description_en: This style features a minimalist 3D rendering aesthetic characterized by smooth, matte textures that resemble soft plastic or modeling clay. It utilizes soft, diffuse global illumination and pastel color palettes to create a clean, toy-like appearance typical of high-end UI icons and modern motion graphics.

prompt_removebg: A high-fidelity 3D rendering of {{subject}} designed with a minimalist, soft-touch aesthetic, resembling high-quality matte clay or smooth velvety plastic. The object features rounded edges, gentle curves, and a tactile finish, devoid of sharp angles or noise. The color palette is dominated by soft {{primary_color}} tones with subtle {{accent_color}} highlights, creating a soothing pastel atmosphere. Lighting is uniformly diffuse, simulating a softbox studio setup with global illumination that casts very soft, blurred contact shadows (ambient occlusion), avoiding any harsh blacks or overexposed highlights. The rendering style mimics a clean Cinema 4D or Blender Octane render with high sub-surface scattering for a slightly translucent, milky look where appropriate. The composition is centered and balanced, set against a seamless, solid {{background_color}} background that complements the pastel tones.
